verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> manifested <S%G5319><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to the disciples <S%G3101><s%> at the Sea <S%G2281><s%> of Tiberias, <S%G5085><s%> and He manifested <S%G5319><s%> [Himself] in this <S%G3779><s%> way. <S%G3779><s%>

There were together <S%G3674><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> and Thomas <S%G2381><s%> called <S%G3004><s%> Didymus, <S%G1324><s%> and Nathanael <S%G3482><s%> of Cana <S%G2580><s%> in Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and the [sons] of Zebedee, <S%G2199><s%> and two <S%G1417><s%> others <S%G243><s%> of His disciples. <S%G3101><s%>

Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "I am going <S%G5217><s%> fishing. <S%G232><s%>" They said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "We will also <S%G2532><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> with you." They went <S%G1831><s%> out, and got <S%G1684><s%> into the boat; <S%G4143><s%> and that night <S%G3571><s%> they caught <S%G4084><s%> nothing. <S%G3762><s%>

But when the day <S%G4407><s%> was now <S%G2235><s%> breaking, <S%G1096><s%> <S%G4407><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> on the beach; <S%G123><s%> yet <S%G3305><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> did not know <S%G3609><s%> that it was Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Children, <S%G3813><s%> you do not have <S%G2192><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> fish, <S%G4371><s%> do you?" They answered <S%G611><s%> Him, "No. <S%G3756><s%>"

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Cast <S%G906><s%> the net <S%G1350><s%> on the right-hand side <S%G3313><s%> of the boat, <S%G4143><s%> and you will find <S%G2147><s%> [a catch]." They cast <S%G906><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> and then <S%G3765><s%> they were not able <S%G2480><s%> to haul <S%G1670><s%> it in because <S%G575><s%> of the great <S%G4128><s%> number <S%G4128><s%> of fish. <S%G2486><s%>

That disciple <S%G3101><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Peter, <S%G4074><s%> "It is the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>" And so <S%G3767><s%> when Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that it was the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> he put <S%G1241><s%> his outer <S%G1903><s%> garment <S%G1903><s%> on (for he was stripped <S%G1131><s%> [for work]), and threw <S%G906><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> into the sea. <S%G2281><s%>

But the other <S%G243><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> in the little <S%G4142><s%> boat, <S%G4142><s%> for they were not far <S%G3112><s%> from the land, <S%G1093><s%> but about <S%G5613><s%> one <S%G1250><s%> hundred <S%G1250><s%> yards <S%G4083><s%> away, <S%G575><s%> dragging <S%G4951><s%> the net <S%G1350><s%> [full] of fish. <S%G2486><s%>

And so <S%G3767><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> they got <S%G576><s%> out upon the land, <S%G1093><s%> they saw <S%G991><s%> a charcoal <S%G439><s%> fire <S%G439><s%> [already] laid, <S%G2749><s%> and fish <S%G3795><s%> placed <S%G1945><s%> on it, and bread. <S%G740><s%>
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Bring <S%G5342><s%> some <S%G575><s%> of the fish <S%G3795><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you have now <S%G3568><s%> caught. <S%G4084><s%>"

Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> went <S%G305><s%> up, and drew <S%G1670><s%> the net <S%G1350><s%> to land, <S%G1093><s%> full <S%G3324><s%> of large <S%G3173><s%> fish, <S%G2486><s%> a hundred <S%G1540><s%> and fifty-three; and although there were so <S%G5118><s%> many, <S%G5118><s%> the net <S%G1350><s%> was not torn. <S%G4977><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Come <S%G1205><s%> [and] have <S%G709><s%> breakfast. <S%G709><s%>" None <S%G3762><s%> of the disciples <S%G3101><s%> ventured <S%G5111><s%> to question <S%G1833><s%> Him, "Who <S%G5101><s%> are You?" knowing <S%G3609><s%> that it was the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and took <S%G2983><s%> the bread, <S%G740><s%> and gave <S%G1325><s%> them, and the fish <S%G3795><s%> likewise. <S%G3668><s%>

This <S%G3778><s%> is now <S%G2235><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> time <S%G5154><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was manifested <S%G5319><s%> to the disciples, <S%G3101><s%> after He was raised <S%G1453><s%> from the dead. <S%G3498><s%>

So <S%G3767><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> they had finished <S%G709><s%> breakfast, <S%G709><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> "Simon, <S%G4613><s%> [son] of John, <S%G2491><s%> do you love <S%G25><s%> Me more <S%G4183><s%> than these <S%G3778><s%>?" He said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Yes, <S%G3483><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%> You know <S%G3609><s%> that I love <S%G5368><s%> You." He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Tend <S%G1006><s%> My lambs. <S%G721><s%>"

He said <S%G3004><s%> to him again <S%G3825><s%> a second <S%G1208><s%> time, <S%G1208><s%> "Simon, <S%G4613><s%> [son] of John, <S%G2491><s%> do you love <S%G25><s%> Me?" He said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Yes, <S%G3483><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%> You know <S%G3609><s%> that I love <S%G5368><s%> You." He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Shepherd <S%G4165><s%> My sheep. <S%G4263><s%>"

He said <S%G3004><s%> to him the third <S%G5154><s%> time, <S%G5154><s%> "Simon, <S%G4613><s%> [son] of John, <S%G2491><s%> do you love <S%G5368><s%> Me?" Peter <S%G4074><s%> was grieved <S%G3076><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to him the third <S%G5154><s%> time, <S%G5154><s%> "Do you love <S%G5368><s%> Me?" And he said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> You know <S%G3609><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things; <S%G3956><s%> You know <S%G1097><s%> that I love <S%G5368><s%> You. "Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Tend <S%G1006><s%> My sheep. <S%G4263><s%>

"Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, when <S%G3753><s%> you were younger, <S%G3501><s%> you used to gird <S%G2224><s%> yourself, <S%G4572><s%> and walk <S%G4043><s%> wherever <S%G3699><s%> you wished; <S%G2309><s%> but when <S%G3752><s%> you grow <S%G1095><s%> old, <S%G1095><s%> you will stretch <S%G1614><s%> out your hands, <S%G5495><s%> and someone <S%G243><s%> else <S%G243><s%> will gird <S%G2224><s%> you, and bring <S%G5342><s%> you where <S%G3699><s%> you do not wish <S%G2309><s%> to [go."]

Now <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> He said, <S%G3004><s%> signifying <S%G4591><s%> by what <S%G4169><s%> kind <S%G4169><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%> he would glorify <S%G1392><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%> And when He had spoken <S%G3004><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Follow <S%G190><s%> Me!"

Peter, <S%G4074><s%> turning <S%G1994><s%> around, <S%G1994><s%> saw <S%G991><s%> the disciple <S%G3101><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> following <S%G190><s%> [them;] the one who <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> had leaned <S%G377><s%> back <S%G377><s%> on His breast <S%G4738><s%> at the supper, <S%G1173><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> is the one who betrays <S%G3860><s%> You?"

Peter <S%G4074><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> seeing <S%G3708><s%> him said <S%G3004><s%> to Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and what <S%G5101><s%> about this <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G3778><s%>?"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "If <S%G1437><s%> I want <S%G2309><s%> him to remain <S%G3306><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> I come, <S%G2064><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> [is that] to you? You follow <S%G190><s%> Me!"

This <S%G3778><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out among <S%G1519><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%> that that disciple <S%G3101><s%> would not die; <S%G599><s%> yet <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> did not say <S%G3004><s%> to him that he would not die, <S%G599><s%> but [only,] "If <S%G1437><s%> I want <S%G2309><s%> him to remain <S%G3306><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> I come, <S%G2064><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> [is that] to you?"

This <S%G3778><s%> is the disciple <S%G3101><s%> who bears <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> of these <S%G3778><s%> things, <S%G3778><s%> and wrote <S%G1125><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things; <S%G3778><s%> and we know <S%G3609><s%> that his witness <S%G3141><s%> is true. <S%G227><s%>

And there are also <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> other <S%G243><s%> things <S%G4183><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> did, <S%G4160><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> they were written <S%G1125><s%> in detail, <S%G1520><s%> I suppose <S%G3633><s%> that even <S%G3761><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> itself <S%G846><s%> would not contain <S%G5562><s%> the books <S%G975><s%> which were written. <S%G1125><s%>
